hours_text:
# EXHIBIT AND OFFICE HOURS

## **EXHIBIT Hours**

** _Our exhibits are currently closed. Please check back in 2026 for information on our next exhibit! We can be reached at_**[** _614-224-0822_**](tel:+16142240822)** _._**

## **Office Hours**

**_Tuesday 10 am - 2 pm by appointment_**

** _Wednesdays 10 am - 4 pm by appointment_**

** _Friday 10 am - 2 pm by appointment_**

** _Closed December 19_**

** _Closed for December 24- 29_**

** _Closed all major holidays and during weather emergencies. Please check our Facebook page for closures._**

**_The Columbus Historical Society has its own parking lot at our buildings location._**__

## CONTACT US

###  _We can be reached by phone at 614-224-0822 and by email at i_[ _nfo@columbushistory.org_](mailto:info@columbushistory.org?subject=Contact%20Us) _._

[ Learn About Donating Artifacts ](https://www.columbushistory.org/donate-artifacts)

collections_text:
## **Columbus Historical Society**

# Preserving, Protecting, and Promoting the History of Central Ohio.

We've been collecting, archiving, teaching, and exhibiting Columbus history for over  
30 years. Come and join one of our free talks or events!

[ Learn more about our mission and organization’s leadership ](https://www.columbushistory.org/about)

[ ](https://www.columbushistory.org/the-art-of-edoardo-alfieri)

## Our hours

Above are our hours of operation. Looking to visit? For more information such as location, parking, and how to contact us to schedule an appointment; check out our visit page below! We’re excited to see you! 

[ visit us ](https://www.columbushistory.org/hours)

[ ](/join-and-support)

## Help preserve Columbus history

Become a member or make a contribution to help preserve Columbus history for future generations. Plus, access to events, news, and tours!

[ Learn more ](/memberships)

[ ](https://www.columbushistory.org/join-and-support)

## Our Capital Campaign

Help the Columbus Historical Society purchase Engine House No. 6 for our permanent home! Donations by check can be mailed to: Columbus Historical Society, 717 West Town Street, Columbus, OH 43222.

[ Donate Today ](/capital-campaign)

[ ](https://www.columbushistory.org/programs)

## dISCOVER COMMUNITY HISTORY

Join one of our free upcoming talks or events to learn more about the people, places, and stories of Columbus’s past. Check out our events and programs page for more!
